attributes.action: Scrap the E-Petition website and save public money
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the considerable public support for the scrapping of the proposed road pricing policy, and Mr Blair subsequently ignoring this opinion, it is obvious that the government is not really interested in the view's of the public. Hence this website is a waste of public money, and should be closed in the name of prudency.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
